languages.text: "Мы покинем тебя пока, {name}. Но в час, когда ты встанешь перед великой бедой, мы вернемся и встанем рядом, плечом к плечу".
"We will leave you for now, {name}. But in the hour when you stand before the great trial, we will return and stand with you, side by side."
languages.original_text: "Мы покинем тебя пока, {name}. Но в час, когда ты встанешь перед великой бедой, мы вернемся и встанем рядом, плечом к плечу".

traits.locale_text: "We will leave you for now, {name}. But in the hour when you stand before the great trial, we will return and stand with you, side by side."
"We will leave you for now, {name}. But in the hour when you stand before the great trial, we will return and stand with you, side by side."
"We will leave you for now, {name}. But in the hour when you stand before the great trial, we will return and stand with you, side by side."
"We will leave you for now, {name}. But in the hour when you stand before the great trial, we will return and stand with you, side by side."
"We will leave you for now, {name}. But in the hour when you stand before the great trial, we will return and stand with you, side by side."

languages.text: 「我々はしばしこの場を離れる{name}。しかし、あなたが大きな試練に立ち向かう時、我々はまたここへ戻り、あなたの味方となろう」
languages.original_text: "We will leave you for now, {name}. But in the hour when you stand before the great trial, we will return and stand with you, side by side."

traits.locale_text: 「我々はしばしこの場を離れる{name}。しかし、あなたが大きな試練に立ち向かう時、我々はまたここへ戻り、あなたの味方となろう」

languages.text: “我们暂时先走了，{name}。不过，当你面对伟大试炼的时候，我们一定会回来，与你并肩作战。”
languages.original_text: "We will leave you for now, {name}. But in the hour when you stand before the great trial, we will return and stand with you, side by side."

traits.locale_text: “我们暂时先走了，{name}。不过，当你面对伟大试炼的时候，我们一定会回来，与你并肩作战。”

languages.text: "Wir verlassen Euch nun, {name}. Doch in der Stunde Eurer großen Prüfung kehren wir zurück und stehen an Eurer Seite."
languages.original_text: "We will leave you for now, {name}. But in the hour when you stand before the great trial, we will return and stand with you, side by side."

traits.locale_text: "Wir verlassen Euch nun, {name}. Doch in der Stunde Eurer großen Prüfung kehren wir zurück und stehen an Eurer Seite."

languages.text: « À présent, nous allons vous laisser, {name}. Mais lorsque viendra la grande épreuve, nous reviendrons et nous tiendrons à vos côtés. »
languages.original_text: "We will leave you for now, {name}. But in the hour when you stand before the great trial, we will return and stand with you, side by side."

traits.locale_text: « À présent, nous allons vous laisser, {name}. Mais lorsque viendra la grande épreuve, nous reviendrons et nous tiendrons à vos côtés. »

languages.text: «Nos retiramos por ahora, {name}. Pero cuando llegue el momento de afrontar la gran ordalía, regresaremos y nos mantendremos a su lado, codo con codo».
languages.original_text: "We will leave you for now, {name}. But in the hour when you stand before the great trial, we will return and stand with you, side by side."

traits.locale_text: «Nos retiramos por ahora, {name}. Pero cuando llegue el momento de afrontar la gran ordalía, regresaremos y nos mantendremos a su lado, codo con codo».

languages.text: "Şimdi sizi bırakacağız {name}. Ancak büyük imtihanın zamanı geldiğinde geri döneceğiz ve safınızda yerimizi alacağız, yan yana duracağız."
languages.original_text: "We will leave you for now, {name}. But in the hour when you stand before the great trial, we will return and stand with you, side by side."

traits.locale_text: "Şimdi sizi bırakacağız {name}. Ancak büyük imtihanın zamanı geldiğinde geri döneceğiz ve safınızda yerimizi alacağız, yan yana duracağız."
